titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching mariners.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-hall, the eighteenth day of Iune, in the second yeere of his reigne ..
This state has arms 11 (with the rose and thistle at top); Steele notation: receiuing Maiesties Maiesties.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
